title: Health Care Facilities COVID-19 Measures Information Page
cleaned_text: Health Care Facilities COVID-19 Measures Information Page The Health Care Facilities information page is available for providers and the public to access the most current State and Federal governmental directives, recommended guidance, clinical data, and FAQs to streamline licensed healthcare facilities operations during the COVID-19 pandemic. This website includes links to Governor's Lee's Executive orders, long-term care facility visitation guidelines, COVID-19 testing requirements, and COVID-19 vaccination information. For additional information on COVID-19 and congregate settings please visit [https://www.tn.gov/health/cedep/ncov/congregate-care-settings.html](https://www.tn.gov/health/cedep/ncov/congregate-care-settings.html) . Governor Bill Lee has issued Executive Orders to extend the State of Emergency related to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic. All Executive Orders may be found at : [https://sos.tn.gov/products/division-publications/executive-orders-governor-bill-lee](https://sos.tn.gov/products/division-publications/executive-orders-governor-bill-lee) Long Term Care Visitation Overview [Long Term Care Visitation Overview](https://www.tn.gov/content/dam/tn/health/documents/cedep/novel-coronavirus/datasets/LTCF-Visitation-Overview.pdf) (3/11/21) [Letter to Long Term Care Providers](https://www.tn.gov/content/dam/tn/health/documents/cedep/novel-coronavirus/datasets/LTCF-Community.pdf) (3/1/21) For additional information, regarding COVID-19 and Congregant
